Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
03.11.2104 GB SCR19285 Added range CHQE_PREDATED = N in selection
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Removed public name
14.02.2006 SH SCR10397 Added new HYPB fields
19.04.2004 SH SCR6029 Update HYPB_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE if
- ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'Y', else CHQE_ADMNO
-- SCR#836 20.02.2002 SH (New program logic)
-- Cheques already scanned, build new index?
-- Delete first all HYPB rows, if a new index required
-- Store new HYPB rows
-- Store new HYPB_BATCHNO in cheque unit, if a new HYPB_BATCHNO
-- was created
-- Send new/old HYPB_BATCHNO back to OPH103 to inform the user
-- Reset HYPB_BATCHNO with 0, if there are still no HYPB rows wxist
-- in table HYPB or a new index is required
-- Store with old HYPB_BATCHNO, no new index required
-- Generate new batchnumber for storing HYPB-rows, only when there is no
-- requirement to work with the existing HYPB_BATCHNO
-- increase v.HYPB_LINENO with 1 to make a unique key
